author: slide
body:
Update the README to point to the preview for both 32-bit and 64-bit ARM

## PR Context  

This will help people find the 64-bit ARM release that is part of the preview.

## PR Checklist

- [x] [PR has a meaningful title]
- [x] [Summarized changes]
- [x] [Change is not breaking]
- [ ] [Make sure all `.h`, `.cpp`, `.cs`, `.ps1` and `.psm1` files have the correct copyright header]
- [x] This PR is ready to merge and is not [Work in Progress]
- **User-facing changes**
    - [x] Not Applicable
    - **OR**  
    - [ ] [Documentation needed]
        - [ ] Issue filed: 
- **Testing - New and feature**
    - [x] N/A or can only be tested interactively
    - **OR**
    - [ ] [Make sure you've added a new test if existing tests do not effectively test the code changed]
        - [ ] [Add `[feature]` to your commit messages if the change is significant or affects feature tests]
title: Update preview for ARM to include both 32-bit and 64-bit
